title: 666: MAX KEISER SAYS BITCOIN WILL BEAT GOLD BY 100X, ALTCOINS WILL GET ‘SHUT DOWN’, GO TO 0!!!!!
description:
Bitcoin Maximalist Max Keiser, recently spoke with Kitco news and shared the following:

"If you priced it in ounces of gold, that would be a more valid way to price it,” Keiser continued. “I am not sure exactly what the exchange rate is for an ounce of gold is to Bitcoin. But whatever it is, you can multiply it by a hundred times and that’s where we are headed.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

itunes:author: Justin Verrengia
itunes:subtitle: Bitcoin Maximalist Max Keiser, co-host of the Keiser Report and Orange Pill Podcast recently spoke with Kitco news and shared the following BTC predictions: “There is no top price for Bitcoin because there is no bottom for fiat money” said Max....
